0_broom.name: Broom
0_broom.description: Broom any amount of messages in a channel you're in.

0_shield.name: Shield
0_shield.description: Access to the global house map updates.

0_door.name: Door
0_door.description: Gain an extra visit for the night.

0_miscellaneous other items.name: Miscellaneous Other Items
0_miscellaneous other items.description: You can't buy this, it's just here to represent random other items you may have from roles and stuff.

0_whisper.name: Whisper
0_whisper.description: A single-use whisper item to send a short message to another player's role channel.

0_forced enchantment.name: Forced Enchantment
0_forced enchantment.description: Enchants your visit to be forced.

0_stealth enchantment.name: Stealth Enchantment
0_stealth enchantment.description: Enchants your visit to be stealthy.

1455642323282169927_fork.name: Fork
1455642323282169927_fork.description: Grab a player and force them to move to a manor. Forced non-stealth visit.

1455642323282169927_knife.name: Knife
1455642323282169927_knife.description: Physical - Kill a player. One purchase per customer, two in stock.

1455642323282169927_spoon.name: Spoon
1455642323282169927_spoon.description: Choose three manors and rename them; move inhabitants to #cereal and control those manors.

1455642323282169927_spork.name: Spork
1455642323282169927_spork.description: Move a manor into the Public Channels category; ownership transfers.

1455642323282169927_plate.name: Plate
1455642323282169927_plate.description: Skip a phase (e.g. N2 -> N3 or D1 -> D2).

1455642323282169927_napkin.name: Napkin
1455642323282169927_napkin.description: Cure a player from any blockage.

1455642323282169927_forky.name: Forky
1455642323282169927_forky.description: Roleblock a player's ability (randomly selected) for one cycle.
